title: Pixel 5 warm / yellowish screen
content:
Hi,
My Pixel 5 have a yellowish screen compared to my previous Pixel 3. I have already returned 2, because they had the same issue.
I tried all the different screen / color settings, with no success.

I can't believe it's intended: it's hardly usable as it is, and a true downgrade compared to the Pixel 3.
Is there a way to fix it?
